channel.title: Azure AI Foundry Model Updates
channel.description: Latest updates on Azure AI Foundry models sold directly by Azure

item.title: gpt-5.2-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model optimized for coding workflows and Codex tooling. It supports both the Chat Completions API and the Responses API, with structured outputs, multimodal (text+image) processing, and advanced tool/function calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2
item.description: A GPT-5.2-series reasoning model for general-purpose multimodal (text+image) tasks. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, and function/tool calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.2-chat
item.description: A GPT-5.2 chat-focused model offered as a preview. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with structured outputs and tool/function calling, but preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-5.1
item.description: A GPT-5.1-series reasoning model with multimodal (text+image) support and structured outputs. It works with both Chat Completions and Responses APIs and supports functions/tools with parallel tool calling.

item.title: gpt-5.1-chat
item.description: A GPT-5.1 chat model in preview with built-in reasoning behavior. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs with structured outputs and tool/function calling, but does not support parameters like temperature typical of non-reasoning chat models.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model intended for coding tasks and Codex CLI/VS Code extension usage. It is available via the Responses API only and supports multimodal inputs, structured outputs, and tool/function calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model for coding and agentic tool use. It is Responses API only and supports multimodal inputs, structured outputs, and tool/function calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5.1-codex-max
item.description: A GPT-5.1 Codex-optimized model variant that adds support for setting reasoning_effort to xhigh. It is Responses API only and supports multimodal inputs, structured outputs, and tool/function calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5
item.description: A GPT-5-series reasoning model for general-purpose multimodal (text+image) tasks. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, and advanced tool/function calling including parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-5 reasoning model designed to provide strong capability with lower cost/latency tradeoffs. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal inputs, and parallel tool calling.

item.title: gpt-5-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-5 reasoning model aimed at efficiency while retaining tool use and multimodal input support. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, and parallel tool calling.

item.title: gpt-5-chat
item.description: A chat-focused GPT-5 model offered in preview with text/image input and text output. Version 2025-10-03 adds an update focused on emotional intelligence and mental health response behavior; preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-5-codex
item.description: A GPT-5 Codex-optimized model for coding tasks and Codex CLI/VS Code extension usage. It is Responses API only and supports multimodal inputs, structured outputs, and tool/function calling with parallel tool calls.

item.title: gpt-5-pro
item.description: A GPT-5 reasoning model variant available via the Responses API, designed for high-capability reasoning workloads. It supports structured outputs, multimodal (text+image) processing, and function/tool calling.

item.title: gpt-oss-120b
item.description: An open-weight reasoning model (preview) for text-in/text-out use cases. It supports the Chat Completions API with streaming, function calling, structured outputs, and can be deployed (requires a Foundry project for deployment).

item.title: gpt-oss-20b
item.description: An open-weight reasoning model (preview) for text-in/text-out scenarios. It supports the Chat Completions API with streaming, function calling, structured outputs, and is available via managed compute and Foundry Local.

item.title: gpt-4.1
item.description: A GPT-4.1-series multimodal model with text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), with a very large context window (noting a documented tool-definition token-length issue).

item.title: gpt-4.1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-4.1-series multimodal model supporting text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), with the same documented tool-definition token-length issue affecting the series.

item.title: gpt-4.1-nano
item.description: A compact GPT-4.1-series multimodal model with text+image input and text output. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, streaming, function calling, and structured outputs (Chat Completions), with the same documented tool-definition token-length issue affecting the series.

item.title: computer-use-preview
item.description: An experimental model trained for use with the Responses API computer use tool. It supports tools and streaming, takes text input/output plus image input (for screenshots), and is intended for scenarios where the model controls mouse/keyboard via third-party libraries.

item.title: codex-mini
item.description: An o-series coding model that is a fine-tuned version of o4-mini. It is available via the Responses API and supports structured outputs, multimodal (text+image) processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3-pro
item.description: An advanced o-series reasoning model focused on problem solving with increased capability. It supports the Responses API with structured outputs, multimodal processing, and functions/tools, and is available in Global Standard in select regions (East US2 and Sweden Central).

item.title: o4-mini
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model offering enhanced reasoning abilities. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal processing, and functions/tools.

item.title: o3
item.description: A newer o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities for science, coding, and math. It supports Chat Completions and Responses APIs, structured outputs, multimodal processing, and functions/tools including parallel tool calling.

item.title: o3-mini
item.description: A smaller o-series reasoning model emphasizing enhanced reasoning with text-only processing. It supports structured outputs and functions/tools for efficient reasoning workloads.

item.title: o1
item.description: An o-series reasoning model with enhanced reasoning abilities and multimodal (text+image) processing. It supports structured outputs and functions/tools for problem-solving tasks.

item.title: o1-preview
item.description: An older preview version in the o1 series. Availability is restricted to customers granted access as part of the original limited access release.

item.title: o1-mini
item.description: A faster and more cost-efficient o1-series model, positioned as ideal for coding tasks requiring speed and lower resource use. Global Standard deployment is available by default, while standard (regional) deployments are limited to select customers from the o1-preview limited access release.

item.title: gpt-4o
item.description: A multimodal GPT-4o (Omni) model that accepts text and images and supports structured outputs, JSON mode, and parallel function calling. Newer versions emphasize improved accuracy/responsiveness, stronger non-English and vision performance, and (in 2024-11-20) enhanced creative writing.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini
item.description: A fast, inexpensive multimodal model intended as a capable replacement for GPT-3.5 Turbo series models. It supports text and image processing, JSON mode, and parallel function calling.

item.title: gpt-4 (turbo-2024-04-09)
item.description: GPT-4 Turbo with Vision is a generally available model used with the Chat Completions API. It replaces earlier GPT-4 preview vision models, though feature availability can vary by input method and deployment type.

item.title: text-embedding-3-large
item.description: The latest and most capable third-generation embeddings model for converting text into vectors for similarity and retrieval. It supports a dimensions parameter to reduce embedding size for cost/performance control, and migration from older embeddings requires regenerating embeddings.

item.title: text-embedding-3-small
item.description: A third-generation embeddings model that improves multilingual retrieval performance compared to earlier embeddings while maintaining strong English performance. It supports reducing embedding size via a dimensions parameter (library support may vary by OpenAI SDK version).

item.title: text-embedding-ada-002
item.description: A legacy embeddings model (with version 1 and version 2) used to convert text into vectors for similarity search. The page notes you cannot upgrade between embeddings models; moving to text-embedding-3-large requires generating new embeddings.

item.title: gpt-image-1
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview that generates images from text prompts (and supports image generation/editing workflows). Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and it is available in specific Global Standard regions listed on the page.

item.title: gpt-image-1-mini
item.description: A smaller GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview. Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and it is available in specific Global Standard regions listed on the page.

item.title: gpt-image-1.5
item.description: A GPT-image-1 series image generation model in limited access preview. Access requires registration and eligibility approval, and it is available in specific Global Standard regions listed on the page.

item.title: dall-e-3
item.description: An image generation model that creates original images from natural language prompts. It is generally available for use with the REST APIs, while some client SDK experiences are noted as preview.

item.title: sora
item.description: A video generation model from OpenAI that creates realistic and imaginative video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in Global Standard in East US 2 and Sweden Central.

item.title: sora-2
item.description: A newer Sora video generation model that creates video scenes from text instructions. It is in preview and available in Global Standard in East US 2 and Sweden Central.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o family audio model in preview for audio and text generation. It supports large token requests and is intended for conversational or generative audio scenarios, with preview lifecycle cautions for production use.

item.title: gpt-4o-audio-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o family audio model in preview for audio and text generation. It supports large token requests and is intended for conversational or generative audio scenarios, with preview lifecycle cautions for production use.

item.title: gpt-4o-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o family audio model in preview designed for real-time audio processing. Multiple versions are listed (2024-12-17 and 2025-06-03), and preview models are not recommended for production.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-realtime-preview
item.description: A GPT-4o mini family audio model in preview for real-time audio processing. It is intended for low-latency speech interactions and is subject to preview lifecycle cautions for production use.

item.title: gpt-realtime
item.description: A generally available (GA) audio model for real-time audio processing. It is listed alongside related realtime/audio mini variants and is used via Azure OpenAI realtime/completions/audio APIs.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini
item.description: A smaller realtime audio model for real-time audio processing. Multiple versions are listed (including 2025-10-06 and 2025-12-15), indicating versioned updates over time.

item.title: gpt-realtime-mini-2025-12-15
item.description: A specific versioned release of the gpt-realtime-mini model for real-time audio processing. It is listed as a dated variant, indicating an update to the mini realtime audio line.

item.title: gpt-audio
item.description: An audio model for real-time audio processing available via Azure OpenAI audio-related APIs. It is listed with a dated version (2025-08-28) and paired with a smaller gpt-audio-mini variant.

item.title: gpt-audio-mini
item.description: A smaller audio model for real-time audio processing. Multiple versions are listed (including 2025-10-06 and 2025-12-15), indicating iterative updates to the mini audio line.

item.title: whisper
item.description: A general-purpose speech recognition model used for speech-to-text and speech translation via the /audio API. It supports audio file uploads up to 25 MB per request.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o and accessed via the /audio API. It supports audio files up to 25 MB per request for transcription workloads.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe
item.description: A speech-to-text model powered by GPT-4o mini and accessed via the /audio API. It supports audio files up to 25 MB per request for transcription workloads.

item.title: gpt-4o-transcribe-diarize
item.description: A speech-to-text model that includes automatic speech recognition features and is accessed via the /audio API. It supports audio files up to 25 MB per request and is listed as a distinct model ID for diarization-capable transcription.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-transcribe-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned GPT-4o mini speech-to-text model with improved transcription accuracy and robustness. It is accessed via the /audio API and supports audio files up to 25 MB per request.

item.title: tts
item.description: A text-to-speech model (preview) optimized for speed. It is used via the /audio API for generating speech from text.

item.title: tts-hd
item.description: A text-to-speech model (preview) optimized for quality. It is used via the /audio API for generating higher-fidelity speech from text.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts
item.description: A text-to-speech model (preview) powered by GPT-4o mini that supports guiding the voice style or tone. It is used via the /audio API for controllable speech generation.

item.title: gpt-4o-mini-tts-2025-12-15
item.description: A versioned GPT-4o mini text-to-speech model (preview) that supports guiding the voice style or tone. It is used via the /audio API and indicates an updated release of the mini TTS capability.

item.title: o3-deep-research
item.description: A specialized o-series model variant intended for deep research workflows. The page notes it is currently only available with Foundry Agent Service, indicating constrained availability compared to other models.

item.title: model-router
item.description: A Microsoft model that routes requests to underlying models based on the prompt, supporting text and image input with a large context window. Multiple versions are available (2025-05-19, 2025-08-07, 2025-11-18), and output token limits vary depending on the routed model.

item.title: MAI-DS-R1
item.description: A Microsoft reasoning chat-completion model that provides reasoning content for complex tasks. It supports very large input/output token limits and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: FLUX.2-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs image generation and editing model that accepts both text and images, supporting multi-reference inputs (up to 8 images via API). Key features include stronger grounding in real-world knowledge, greater output flexibility, and enhanced performance, available via the BFL provider API.

item.title: FLUX.1-Kontext-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs in-context image generation and editing model supporting text+image prompts. It emphasizes character consistency and advanced editing, and can be used via Azure OpenAI image endpoints and the BFL provider API (preview api-version).

item.title: FLUX-1.1-pro
item.description: A Black Forest Labs text-to-image model designed for fast inference and strong prompt adherence. It is available via Azure OpenAI image generation endpoints and the BFL provider API (preview api-version), with competitive pricing and scalable generation highlighted.

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-pro
item.description: A Cohere rerank/text-classification model for ranking documents or passages against a query. It outputs JSON and supports many languages, and is available in Global Standard across all regions (also via managed compute).

item.title: Cohere-rerank-v4.0-fast
item.description: A faster Cohere rerank/text-classification model variant for ranking tasks. It outputs JSON, supports many languages, and is available in Global Standard across all regions (also via managed compute).

item.title: Cohere-command-a
item.description: A Cohere chat-completion model optimized for reasoning, summarization, and question answering. It supports tool calling and can return text or JSON, with Global Standard availability across all regions.

item.title: embed-v-4-0
item.description: A Cohere embeddings model that supports both text and image inputs and outputs vectors in selectable dimensions. It supports multiple languages and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2-Speciale
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model that includes reasoning content and is optimized for step-by-step reasoning tasks. It supports large context and output sizes, and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.2
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content designed for language, scientific reasoning, and coding tasks. It supports large context and output sizes and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3.1
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model with reasoning content that supports tool calling. It is designed for strong reasoning performance and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1-0528
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning chat-completion model with very large context and output limits. It is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-V3-0324
item.description: A DeepSeek chat-completion model (non-reasoning-content variant as listed) that supports tool calling and large context/output sizes. It is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions.

item.title: DeepSeek-R1
item.description: A DeepSeek reasoning chat-completion model with very large context and output limits. It is available in both Global Standard and Global Provisioned managed across all regions.

item.title: Llama-4-Maverick-17B-128E-Instruct-FP8
item.description: A Meta multimodal chat-completion model that accepts text and images with very large token limits. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and targets multilingual reasoning and instruction-following use cases.

item.title: Llama-3.3-70B-Instruct
item.description: A Meta chat-completion model optimized for instruction following. It supports a large input context with a smaller output limit and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: Mistral-Large-3
item.description: A Mistral multimodal chat-completion model supporting text and image input with tool calling and JSON outputs. It is available in Global Standard in West US 3.

item.title: mistral-document-ai-2505
item.description: A Mistral Image-to-Text model for extracting text from images or PDF pages (up to 30 pages / 30MB). It returns text/JSON/Markdown and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with Data Zone Standard availability in US and EU.

item.title: Kimi-K2.5
item.description: A Moonshot AI multimodal reasoning model that accepts text and image input and returns reasoning content. It supports tool calling and very large context/output sizes, and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: Kimi-K2-Thinking
item.description: A Moonshot AI reasoning model positioned as a highly capable open-source thinking model. It supports tool calling with very large context/output sizes and is available in Global Standard across all regions.

item.title: grok-4
item.description: An xAI Grok chat-completion model designed for enterprise tasks such as extraction, coding, summarization, and agentic applications. It supports tool calling and is available in Global Standard across all regions, with registration required for access.

item.title: grok-4-fast-reasoning
item.description: An xAI Grok fast reasoning chat-completion model supporting text and image input with tool calling. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and in Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-4-fast-non-reasoning
item.description: An xAI Grok fast non-reasoning chat-completion model supporting text and image input with tool calling. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and in Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-code-fast-1
item.description: An xAI Grok coding-focused chat-completion model intended for coding and agentic use cases with tool calling. It is available in Global Standard across all regions, with registration required for access.

item.title: grok-3
item.description: An xAI Grok chat-completion model supporting tool calling with very large context and output sizes. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and in Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: grok-3-mini
item.description: A smaller xAI Grok chat-completion model supporting tool calling with very large context and output sizes. It is available in Global Standard across all regions and in Data Zone Standard (US).

item.title: Ministral-3B (preview) (2411)
item.description: A Mistral model listed under fine-tuning models as preview, with fine-tuning noted as not supported in standard regions. It is available for global training in Foundry but has unknown output/training example context details in the table.

item.title: Qwen-32B (preview)
item.description: A Qwen model listed under fine-tuning models as preview, with fine-tuning noted as not supported in standard regions. It is available for global training in Foundry and includes an 8,000 token input limit and 32,000 token output limit in the fine-tuning table.

item.title: gpt-4
item.description: A GPT-4 model family referenced for Assistants and provisioned deployments, with multiple versions listed (for example 0613, 1106-Preview, 0125-Preview). These models are used with the Chat Completions API, and availability varies by region and deployment type.

item.title: gpt-4-32k
item.description: A GPT-4 variant referenced in Assistants and provisioned deployment availability tables. It is intended for larger-context GPT-4 workloads, with availability varying by region and deployment type.

item.title: gpt-35-turbo
item.description: A GPT-3.5 Turbo family model referenced in Assistants and provisioned deployment availability tables, with multiple versions listed (for example 0613, 1106, 0125) and a 16k variant. Availability varies by region and deployment type.

item.title: gpt-35-turbo-16k
item.description: A GPT-3.5 Turbo variant referenced for Assistants availability with a larger context window than standard GPT-3.5 Turbo. Availability varies by region and deployment type as shown in the Assistants table.
